page.title: 06Stonegate Youth Club
page.content: Stonegate Youth Club meets once a week in Stonegate Village Hall.As there are many members and a large range of ages the club is divided into senior and junior sections.The juniors take part in organised games and activities,such as stoolball,snooker,darts,cricket, unihoc and treasure hunts.The seniors prefer to organise their own activities,or listen to records or tapes.For all members the 'disco' is one of the most popular pastimes.The members run their own disco evenings using the club's own equipment.As well as using the Village Hall the members travel further afield seeking other entertainments and activities,such as ice skating,ski-ing on an artificial ski slope,swimming,rock climbing, hiking and visiting amusement parks.
